Josh Ferrara is a web & mobile developer, designer, musician, novice runner, technology enthusiast, watch collector, food lover, LSU alumnus, husband, and dog owner. He is currently living in Baton Rouge, Louisiana.

I'm falling...

Similar posts Nov 15

Ok, for once, I know what kind of vehicle I really want. And here it is.

Crazy, right? I've never considered myself a truck guy, but then again, I'm not really sure what car category you'd put me in. Not your normal convertible fan, not really a minivan pilot either though.

Anyway, this has caught my eye, so we'll see what happens. My recent business venture with Greg seems to be taking off, so that's always good. Who knew so many businesses needed new websites? Yay God for handling financial situations :)

However, in the words of JP, any anonymous financial donations are quite welcome.
